parents-vp-safe-description: All details have been taken care of: animators are selected under strict conditions, detailed children registration, smooth carpets, electric socket caps, insurances, etc.
parents-vp-easy-description: Search no more for a babysitter, simply register online to PopupCamp. Enjoy your events better with this simple solution.
parents-vp-fun-description: We organize activities specific to the topic of each events so your children will understand what at heart to their parents.
